scripts.start: npm run build && npm run serve
scripts.styleguide: styleguide --kss-source 'src/css/**/*.css' --style-source 'dist/app.css' --output styleguide --title 'Seed Style Guide' --extraHead '<link rel="stylesheet" href="/fixtures/styleguide/sg.css">' --commonClass 'sg-root' --appRoot /styleguide
scripts.icon: svg-sprite src/svg/icon/*.svg -sc --symbol-dest dist --ss icon.svg --cs --ccss --css-render-css-template fixtures/svg-sprite/icons.css.mustache --css-dest src/css/settings --css-render-css-dest icons.css
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run icon && npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.build:js: browserify src/js -t babelify -s app | uglifyjs -m -c drop_console=true -o dist/app.js
scripts.watch: npm run watch:css & npm run watch:styleguide & npm run watch:js & npm run watch:test & npm run watch:serve
